00076 def CheckChangeOnUpload(input_api, output_api):
00077   report = []
00078   report.extend(input_api.canned_checks.PanProjectChecks(
00079       input_api, output_api))
00080   return report
00081 
00082 
00083 def CheckChangeOnCommit(input_api, output_api):
00084   report = []
00085 
00086   # Accept any year number from 2009 to the current year.
00087   current_year = int(input_api.time.strftime('%Y'))
00088   allowed_years = (str(s) for s in reversed(xrange(2009, current_year + 1)))
00089   years_re = '(' + '|'.join(allowed_years) + ')'
00090 
00091   # The (c) is deprecated, but tolerate it until it's removed from all files.
00092   license = (
00093       r'.*? Copyright (\(c\) )?%(year)s Google Inc\. All rights reserved\.\n'
00094       r'.*? Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style license that '
00095         r'can be\n'
00096       r'.*? found in the LICENSE file\.\n'
00097   ) % {
00098       'year': years_re,
00099   }
00100 
00101   report.extend(input_api.canned_checks.PanProjectChecks(
00102       input_api, output_api, license_header=license))
00103   report.extend(input_api.canned_checks.CheckTreeIsOpen(
00104       input_api, output_api,
00105       'http://gyp-status.appspot.com/status',
00106       'http://gyp-status.appspot.com/current'))
00107 
00108   import os
00109   import sys
00110   old_sys_path = sys.path
00111   try:
00112     sys.path = ['pylib', 'test/lib'] + sys.path
00113     blacklist = PYLINT_BLACKLIST
00114     if sys.platform == 'win32':
00115       blacklist = [os.path.normpath(x).replace('\\', '\\\\')
00116                    for x in PYLINT_BLACKLIST]
00117     report.extend(input_api.canned_checks.RunPylint(
00118         input_api,
00119         output_api,
00120         black_list=blacklist,
00121         disabled_warnings=PYLINT_DISABLED_WARNINGS))
00122   finally:
00123     sys.path = old_sys_path
00124   return report
00125

00127 TRYBOTS = [
00128     'gyp-win32',
00129     'gyp-win64',
00130     'gyp-linux',
00131     'gyp-mac',
00132     'gyp-android'
00133 ]

00136 def GetPreferredTryMasters(_, change):
00137   return {
00138       'tryserver.nacl': { t: set(['defaulttests']) for t in TRYBOTS },
00139   }
